short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts text between Hebrew and English keyboard layouts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin was design to convert text between Hebrew and English keyboard layouts, meaning if you accidentally wrote in english but meant to write in hebrew (or the opposite) the plugin will convert it for you
